title: Warning
description: Loneliness, death and the meaning of life, explored through vastly separate lives colliding in interweaving short stories set in future Earth.

reviews.text: (Mauro Lanari)Feature film debut of a Polish production that, following its own tradition, catechizes us on the presumed consequences of atheism and sins. A chaotic, religiously fundamentalist and heretical "Se7en" (Fincher 1995) since, against the magisterial doctrine, it shows the Apocalypse as punishment and not as salvation.

The main idea of the film Warning is great and very current. It's just a shame that it is based on physical reality that violates many physical laws. For someone who studied well at school, the film can be considered quite naive.
